price: 8. Rabbigayow! Gali kuwaasi Beeraha negaya (Jannada) ee aad u ballan qaadday, iyo kuwa wanaagsan oo ka mid ah aabbayaashood iyo xaasaskooda iyo ubadkooda. Waxaad Adigu tahay (Allow) Adkaadaha Sarreeya, Xakiimka ah.
arabic: رَبَّنَا وَأَدۡخِلۡهُمۡ جَنَّٰتِ عَدۡنٍ ٱلَّتِي وَعَدتَّهُمۡ وَمَن صَلَحَ مِنۡ ءَابَآئِهِمۡ وَأَزۡوَٰجِهِمۡ وَذُرِّيَّٰتِهِمۡۚ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā wa-adkhil'hum jannāti ʿadnin allatī waʿadttahum waman ṣalaḥa min ābāihim wa-azwājihim wadhurriyyātihim innaka anta al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
